title: CONSIDER THE ORIGION
description: Click away from the story to investigate the site, its mission and contact information.

title: BEYOND READING
description: To get clicks, the headline may be outrageous. What"s the whole story?

title: CHECK THE AUTHOR
description: Do a quick search on the author. Are they credible? Are they real?

title: SUPPORT THE SOURCE?
description: Click on these links. Determine if the information provided actually supports the story.

title: CHECK THE DATE
description: Reprinting old news stories does not mean they are related to current events.

title: IS IT A JOKE?
description: If it's too outrageous, it may be satire. Research the site and the author to be sure.

title: CHECK YOUR BIASES
description: Consider whether your own beliefs may influence your judgment.

title: ASK THE EXPERTS
description: Ask a librarian, or consult a fact-checking website.
